description:
Clain is the main character. He has doppels for parents, which are robot-like beings his parents can control. With a single movement, they will disperse. Clain is fond of ancient things, like scrolls and such. Since many people use their doppels, he is upset that he does not see more humans around. He was given a brooch by http://anidb.net/ch22209 [Phryne]. Clain believes in making wishes upon the day star.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Clain
